title: Transform Transaction Data with Comprehensions
description: Use dictionary and set comprehensions to transform and filter transaction data for your finance tracker. Practice creating lookup dictionaries and filtering data efficiently.
instructions:
1. Given a list of transaction dictionaries, create a lookup dict by transaction ID
2. Use a dict comprehension to filter only 'expense' type transactions
3. Use a dict comprehension to create a category -> total amount mapping
4. Use a set comprehension to get unique merchants
5. Print all results
